product_overview: Rojnivis is a premium, AI-powered collaborative knowledge management platform designed for enhanced journaling, note-taking, and mind mapping. It integrates modern note-taking features with biometrics, advanced AI capabilities, rich media support, and real-time collaboration while maintaining a seamless, notebook-like user experience.
core_goals: Resolve dependency injection issues and establish a centralized App Module for scalable architecture.
Integrate comprehensive AI-powered features including automated summarization, smart categorization, semantic search, voice-to-text transcription, and personalized writing suggestions.
Introduce multi-modal input methods such as OCR, voice recording, handwriting recognition, PDF annotation, and web clipping.
Enhance organization through smart collections, hierarchical tagging, cross-referencing, advanced filtering, and custom templates.
Build collaborative and synchronization capabilities including real-time collaboration, cloud backup, cross-platform sync, sharing, and permissions.
Upgrade UX with premium interactions, animations, and paper texture effects to simulate a physical notebook feel.
Improve Mindmap widget with advanced layout, customization, exporting, and multi-user collaboration features.
Perform technical refactoring focusing on performance optimization, code quality, and advanced security measures.
key_features: Journal Management with powerful search and advanced filters supporting rich media including images, audio, sketches, and files.
Category Management with AI-powered smart categorization and hierarchical tagging system.
Interactive Mindmap visualization enhanced with multiple node styles, auto-layout algorithms, zoom, export options, and collaborative editing.
AI Quick Questions module generating journaling prompts via Gemini AI and providing automated note summarization and writing suggestions.
App Settings for theme selection, biometric security integration, local authentication and advanced device security options.
Multi-modal Inputs supporting OCR image text extraction, voice recording with automatic transcription, handwriting recognition, PDF annotation, and a web clipper function.
Advanced Organizational Tools including smart collections, cross-referencing, backlinking, saved searches, and custom templates.
Real-time Collaboration and Cloud Sync featuring multi-user editing, commenting, change tracking, cloud backups (Google Drive, Dropbox, OneDrive), and cross-platform synchronization.
Rich Media and Embeds supporting embeddable content like YouTube and Spotify, interactive charts and diagrams, and advanced file previews.
UX Enhancements featuring fluid page flip animations, ink effects, smooth theme morphing, ripple effects, gesture-based interactions, paper texture with shading, and defter (notebook) style visuals.
user_flow_summary: Users launch the app selecting from multiple themes with biometric security authentication.
Users create, view, and manage journal entries with advanced search, filters, and AI-generated prompts to enrich content.
Users organize notes into categories using AI-assisted suggestions and hierarchical tagging.
Users navigate and explore their notes visually through an interactive mindmap which supports zoom, clustering, and exporting.
Users input notes via text, voice, images (OCR), handwriting, or PDF annotations, leveraging multi-modal methods.
Users collaborate in real-time on shared notes and mindmaps with commenting, change tracking, and voice annotations.
Users configure app settings including theme choice, authentication methods, and sync preferences.
Users benefit from cloud backups and cross-platform synchronization ensuring data safety and availability across devices.
validation_criteria: Dependency Injection issues resolved with centralized App Module fully functional and tested.
Comprehensive test coverage >90% including DI, new AI features, multi-modal inputs, and collaboration modules.
Successful integration and accurate performance of AI features such as automatic summarization, smart categorization, and voice transcription.
Smooth, stable, and visually appealing UX animations including page flips, ink effects, and theme morphing validated with user feedback.
Effective performance optimizations demonstrated by app startup time <2 seconds and memory usage <150MB.
Secure storage and end-to-end encryption implementations pass security audits.
Cloud backup and real-time collaboration features operate reliably with minimal sync latency.
Cross-platform synchronization tested across supported devices with consistent data integrity.
User engagement metrics show improvement: +50% engagement, +30% daily actives, 4.8+ app store rating.
All new features documented with usage guides and API specifications consistent with OpenAPI standards.
